overview_of_class: Students examine a variety of ways that new media popular culture forms have human experience. We investigate how engaging with new media shapes and alters everyday life by addressing their articulation to four related contexts: 1) how we understand ourselves and others; 2) how we form connections and relationships; and 3) how we engage with stories and texts that matter to us; 4) how we generate creative work.
name: New Media as Popular Culture
subject: COMM_ST
